Preface
Welcome to my continuously evolving cookbook. I like to cook for my kids and I am learning as much as I can.
If you want to contribute your recipe to this book please send me an email at rohit@rohitfarmer.com.

title: 2  Breakfast
text:
Two slices of bread
One egg
A couple of tablespoons of milk
Sugar to taste
A drop of vanilla extract
Powdered sugar for dressing (optional)



Whisk the egg with milk and sugar until the sugar is dissolved.
Add a drop of vanilla extract and mix it well.
Pour the mix into a vast and shallow bowl or plate.
Soak the bread slice on both sides.
Shallow fry the soaked bread in butter or oil.

title: 2  Breakfast
text:
2.2 Vegetable Namkeen Jave (Vermicelli Upma)
Ingredients

Roasted vermicelli (1 cup)
Water (2 cups; twice as much as vermicelli)
Finely chopped onions and tomato
Finely chopped vegetables (carrots and/or peas and/or corn)
Cashews
Oil, cumin seeds, curry leaves, salt, and green chillies

Steps

Heat oil in a deep pan
Add cumin seeds, curry leaves, and green chillies
Caramelize some onions
Add vegetables and sauté them at medium heat
Add tomatoes and cashews
Once the vegetables are cooked and tender, add vermicelli with twice as much water as vermicelli.
Cover and simmer for 10 minutes or until vermicelli is cooked.

title: 1  Appetizers
text:
1.1 Pink Grapefruit And Avocado Slices In Dijon Mustard Vinaigrette
Cut the grapefruit and avocado into slices and place them in pairs. Dress them with a layer of Dijon mustard vinaigrette.
Ingredients for the vinaigrette
Steps to make the vinaigrette
Combine the mustard, vinegar, lemon juice, salt, and pepper in a small bowl or measuring cup. Whisk in the oil. Peel the garlic clove and lightly crush, or cut down to the root end with a paring knife, keeping the garlic clove intact. Place in the dressing and allow to marinate for at least 30 minutes. Remove from the dressing before serving.

title: 1  Appetizers
text:
1 rounded tablespoon Dijon mustard
1 ½ tablespoons red wine vinegar or sherry vinegar
1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice
Salt to taste
Freshly ground pepper
½ cup extra virgin olive oil, or use half olive oil and half canola or grapeseed oil
1 small garlic clove
